channel.title: Sup
channel.description: Hey, it's been a while since I've done ANYTHING over here; I was pondering on the idea of making a private server... What revision do you guys think I should go for, and what features do you mainly look for in a private server?

item.title: Sup
item.dc:creator: @BubbleScape_x BubbleScape x
item.description:
@BubbleScape_x wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:23, topic:346552”][quote author=BubbleScape x link=topic=442932.msg3253047#msg3253047 date=1277919482]

[quote author=Evil_ link=topic=442932.msg3252565#msg3252565 date=1277876799]

Meh, the cache is whatever you want, as long as it’s not a stereotype. I would like to see something different. I’m tired of people thinking if its a cache higher than 317 that its going to be some spawn PK server. I would like to see economy and real gameplay value brought into a 508+ cache server. Just my opinion on things.
[/quote]I was really thinking about 508. I would like to try to find a bare-ass client because I hate how people add all the gay shit to them lol. If I can find one, I’ll probably begin work.

612
[/quote]nty

Hmm, i look into a pking source, haven’t yet found one. I look for ones with Dclaws, Pk point system, working lose items when you die pvping, all in a 317

Lol go get a 508 then, 317 should have only 317 stuff none of that gay D claws or customs shit.[/quote]I would love to, but newbs are too hateful to 508s, plus they will all quit my server.
I just love how people are too lazy to download an ipchanger.

Read full topic

Hmm, i look into a pking source, haven’t yet found one. I look for ones with Dclaws, Pk point system, working lose items when you die pvping, all in a 317 :p[/quote]

Lol go get a 508 then, 317 should have only 317 stuff none of that gay D claws or customs shit.

Just my opinion on things.

612
[/quote]nty[/quote]

item.title: Sup
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Phaze One:

A true 474 would be nice.

I agree, 474 is my favorite protocol by far and I haven’t seen a clean and decent one written. A first release as an easy to work with 474 would be great as well, and then create a later release with more complex features added in.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:19, topic:346552”][quote author=Evil_ link=topic=442932.msg3252704#msg3252704 date=1277884530]
Maybe I’ll go from a Hyperion base and see what I can do? Then maybe after a while I’ll go for 508 or something higher in revision.
[/quote]
Why not make it so multiple revisions can coonect?[/quote]like battlescape
FFFFF
someone gets me
<3

Read full topic

item.title: Sup
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“Evil_, post:14, topic:346552”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=442932.msg3252660#msg3252660 date=1277880944]

[quote author=Evil_ link=topic=442932.msg3252656#msg3252656 date=1277880789]

Phaze is right maybe a 474? we need one no one has really done anything with a 474.

You could also write a nice, easy to program, stable, 317 base for newer members so they don’t have to catch the winterlove disease?

Or you can just use a WinterLove or Hyperion and add a nice little combat system since that’s what everyone is into now…
[/quote]There’s quite a few sexy bases for 317 from what I’ve seen already.

I know like Hyperion.
[/quote]Are many people still into the 317 revision?[/quote]
Oh yes, a lot.

Read full topic
